title: District Profile: Mississippi's 4th, A Conservative Stronghold
teaser: Republican U.S. Rep. Steven Palazzo and Democrat Matt Moore are facing off in Mississippi's fourth congressional district.
contentencoded:
In this week’s installment of District Profiles, we look at Mississippi’s fourth congressional district, where Republican incumbent Steven Palazzo will try to hold onto his job from challenger Matt Moore, a Democrat.

Paul Hampton of the Sun Herald in Biloxi-Gulfport and Mississippi’s Gulf Coast joins Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson to discuss the dynamics of the district and the race.

  • See more District Profiles in our series

Guest

  • Paul Hampton, of the Sun Herald out of Biloxi-Gulfport and Mississippi’s Gulf Coast. He tweets @JPaulHampton.
